entry.tran: 家庭;一家人;同住一幢房子的人
entry.def: A household is all the people in a family or group who live together in a house.

example.tran: 在一个只有男性的家庭里长大

example.ex: Many poor households are experiencing real hardship.
example.tran: 很多贫穷家庭正经历严重的困难。

entry.def: The household is your home and everything that is connected with looking after it.

example.ex: My husband gave me cash to manage the household, but none of it was ever my own.
example.tran: 丈夫给我钱来持家，但这些钱一毫一厘都不属于我。

entry.tran: 家喻户晓的;众人皆知的
entry.def: Someone or something that is a household name or word is very well known.

example.ex: Today, fashion designers are household names...
example.tran: 今天，时装设计师是家喻户晓的人物。

example.ex: My agent told me, 'This'll make your name a household word.'
example.tran: 我的经纪人告诉我：“这将使你一举成名。”

entry.tran: （用于王室警卫队名称中）皇家的
entry.def: Household is used in the names of groups of soldiers who have the job of protecting a king or queen and their family.

sentences.sentence: "I waited until the whole house was asleep"
"the teacher asked how many people made up his home"

auth_sentence.content: It's a household name ... a well-loved brand.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's a household name ... a well-loved brand.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's a household name ... a well-loved brand.

auth_sentence.content: Four times your household income is the new norm.
auth_sentence.res_content: Four times your household income is the new norm.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Four times your household income is the new norm.

auth_sentence.content: She sews a lot of her own household dressings.
auth_sentence.res_content: She sews a lot of her own household dressings.

Sentence.sentence: With the time spent eating, sleeping and taking care of household duties.
It is reported that 49 million Americans are unsure of where they will find their next meal What's most surprising is that 36% of them live in households where at least one adult is working.
Her household bills piled up, along with the dishes and dirty laundry, but it took near-constant complaints from her four daughters before she realized she had a problem.
The household survey has a larger problem.
The household survey can be faulty in that some people won't provide truthful information
From December 1928 to December 1929, total household wealth declined only 3%.

means.word_mean: 同住在一所房子里的人, 一家人, 户

sentences.en: I grew up as part of a large household.
The whole households were up early.
He was the head of a household.
Edison has become a household name
sentences.cn: 爱迪生已经成为了一个家喻户晓的名字
